title: Won 10/10 placement games and get Bronze 5
body:
Congratulations Riot on making my first day of Season 6 one to remember!
Hey guys and girls, I would just like to mention how great it is to finally be playing another year of league of legends ranked!
I woke up early today with high hopes and the Excitement of playing my 10 placement matches. I was not suprised nor spooked as I cleaned up every last soul on summoners rift winning 10 out of 10 of my placement games. Keep in mind that I was Bronze 3 to finish off the last season carrying all of my games in that elo only to be let down by the unskilled and unpolished mechanics of 'Bronzies'. In high hopes of winning all of my placements I saw a beam of hope that I would be put with players that are based around my skill level (silver to low gold). But I was outraged as I was placed in to Bronze 5, three ranks lower than the rank I finished at last season! This is absolute crap if you ask me, how could I be demoted after winning every single one of my games? I may as well should've lost all my games and won 0/10 to obtain to same rank.
I have invested 100s of dollars into this game only to be let down by the sloppy management of the league of legends committee not fully assessing and understanding the importance of the placement games for players. Thank you Riot Games for yet again making this a positive experience for me in league of legends, I have also invested not just money into this game but my own personal time that has been sabotaged by your poor ranking system.
I would dearly appreciate it if you where to overlook my placement and place me into a rank that is most suited with the amount of games I won in my placements and two how I played and performed in those games.
Thanks you for your time, I love this game but this may be the hole in your fortress 
IGM : Just a Smurf

replies.body: Riot Provisional System is clearly broken. What's the point of a reset, or so a "clean slate" as RIOT says for the season and re-doing placements.  If from what I am reading here is correct. The guy placed b5 after winning 10/10 placement games. Clean Slate or Reset has no meaning. Placements have no meaning. Opening a new account and starting over to place higher in a division with same 10/10 placements is just a RIOT scam to spend more money to build runes, characters etc from scratch. Your spending is going to be lot more all over again on a new account vs existing account. This Placement system is just another scam by gaming company as RIOT. Where they they take pride in selling the idea of professional gaming of players that have abandoned education to pursue Professional gaming by spending 1000's of hours and you can be one too if you spend 14 hours a day playing there game. More hours + more accounts = more profit. And few really make it to top and the fact all tell their stories on videos that this is life and they have achieved something great at the age of 22 cause school is not for them is absolutely ridiculous. This company should be ashamed how they market this crap to benefit off young kids by sending the wrong message.

you cant buy rune with money. only IP, get off your conspiracy theory high horse. If you guys don't like the game, don't play. Its not even like you need to spend money to play this game. As for the OP complaining about his hundreds of dollars and hours being wasted on this game, then dont spend hundreds of dollars. Dont devote so much of your time to this game. Its a damn game for crying out loud, you cant be so entitled with something that was literally made with the intention of spending your time competing for fun against other random people, they owe you absolutely nothing.
What rank were you last season, assuming you played? Your MMR matters more than the actual placements, so most people will typically get placed in a similar division as what they were.

> [{quoted}](name=Kao Atlantis,realm=NA,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=lkRpwBXF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-20T19:09:26.773+0000)
>
> What rank were you last season, assuming you played? Your MMR matters more than the actual placements, so most people will typically get placed in a similar division as what they were.

Boy, I sure feel like the placement matches should be an opportunity to have somewhat of a clean slate, not just 10 more matches at the same exact elo you were at, except slightly lower, and you can't see until you've played 10.  It's hard enough to move around in solo ranked queue.  They should be trying to see how well I play against silver players, not how well I do with people on my team who can't figure out not to switch over to Facebook in the middle of a game, or who take graves in the jungle, or who don't realize that we already have a top lane, and pick one anyway.  (I'll give you a preview - I didn't win those matches.  Well good news, guess it doesn't matter anyway!)
I finished last season as Bronze 3
So doesnt that mean I should get something higher as I was playing with bronze 3s?
i know how you feel me and my friends won 10/10 and 1 got bronze 1 the other got bronze 4 and i got bronze 5

I think that just cos you won all your games, doesnt mean that you carried. In order to really rank up you have to carry all your 10 games then you will end up where you want to be. You basically got lucky that you had carries on your team. At the end of the game, did you see what your performance indicator was? If it was below a B lets say, then you probably didnt carry. I know someone who won 8/10 games and got placed in gold 5. So just because you win games doesnt really mean that you are good. I think that your MMR starts with somewhere lower than what you currently are and you have to bring it up basically by carrying like almost every game. 

 So I know for sure that my MMR right now is bronze 5 even though I was bronze 4 last season. If lets say I dont play as well in my remaining placement games then I will stay as bronze 5.  


Disclaimer: I'm no expert but this is what I've heard/noticed from pro players and streams so I may be wrong.
I won 9/10 games didnt check the score but i rarely had deaths above 1-4 and im still Bronze 5 since last season

I have to agree, Riots matchmaking and ranked system has been fucking bullshit for years, and this year it hasn't changed a bit, by the looks of things... there needs to be some sort of change lol or atleast give people an incentive to climb. Maybe at the end of each month you give someone a promotional series and they have the chance to play a couple games against someone in a higher elo and if they can win the series they can jump there. Like fuck, anything is better than this flawed system. It honestly is starting to deter me from this game, and I'm sure a lot of other gamers are feeling the same way. And btw riot, stop banning people for raging in game, you brought this upon yourself - 1. Matchmaking system is broken, when you play the game half decent and get paired with people who legit plays like a bot, what do you thinks going to happen? 2. You give us access to chatting to the opposite team (what you think we are are going to say to them? hey man hows your day?) its a competitive game, shit talk is part of every competitive game... 2k16 is full of a bunch of pussies who get offended from anything. 2. give us a friggin in game actual audio chat... can guarantee it would cut the cancer in half because people are hesitant to use voice. Who the heck even makes all these rules and dumb ass ideas?

and in all honesty, I played a number of games on my friends high plat account, and I won more games in that elo than I ever have in gold or silver, that's how you know this system is bullshit and isn't designed for anyone new in the game to climb. All these self glorified wankers in higher elos aren't even that good lol you just make them seem so good because the matchmaking and ranked system is so bad and innacurate
You just admitted to account sharing on forums gg.
Hey man check your mmr that might solve your issue use this site op.gg
what does mmr mean
that my friend is why your bronze.

Hi there all. From what I've heard, the ranked system acts in a way where the rank of this season "MUST"be lower then the rank of the previous season. In fact I think it even could be a full devision. I've heard this will happen in every beginning of the season...
Could this be true?

Then again, I cannot explain why this happens to new accounts/new players as well...
same thing here 10/10 and  i was placed in bronze  after finishing at silver 1 last season no logic behind  that
Damn

hello!For 4 years playing this game now my lowest tier was s4 and i had never ever been in bronze...I won 5/10 games bcs i had noobs and trollers in my games with stats like 2/10 and etc...I got bronze 3 while i carry the shit out of my team every single game except the lost games :)
I don't know why u made it like this but i am definetly sure that u will lose a lot of players if u don't fix it...In season 4 or 5 i don't really remember...I got 7-8 out of 10 games and got silver 1 and 2 without even playing well...I don't know what happend lol anymore it's not the same as before :(

I carried all my games even got a penta in one of my placements won 6 games lost 4 two of them i had 500ms the other two i had feeders and i had a average kda of 12/3/12 and yet was placed bronze V , this can not be based on skill level because how can it be that i carried all the games even when i lost i had positive kda's however I was placed in bronze V i was silver 2 last season btw.
I won 8/10 of my placement matches and was put in Bronze 3. I have never finished a season lower than silver. So wtf riot?
I FEEL YOUR PAIN
You did not win 10/10 placement games {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I thought that i was the only one entering bronze 5 after many won matches in 10 first games but not. Haha only stupid people created such a ranking system. Do not mean KDA here because the game is a team one. If you mean that, who will love to play support or adc more ? Carry one is always jungler, top or mid. This is a stupid answer that i had ever heard. 10/10 won games are a good evaluation, do not mean KDA.
wtf me have 7  win  2 lose game  now bronza division why ? dat riot{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Won 10/10 i almost carry all 28 kill 2 death 21 kill 4 death i carefull most of my move even my team work so f hard still go to bronze 5 if you guys believe go to gg.op na server look my name ichigonara bullshit man wtf is this.

same think happened to me for season 7 i started in season six and was placed in bronze 1 then ended the season in bronze 2 i do my placement matches for season 7 i won 8 out of ten matches went positive each time and got demoted to bronze 5

If everyone gets placed lower than last season and i was b5. Then why do I even try in my placements? (Queuing up for tenth placement game now.)  and if its based win or lose and not skill then these ragers and leavers are really fuckin me lol.

feel you bro
even if im not talking about placement matches i agree teams are stupid ESPECIALLY ON YOUR ******* PROMOS WHERE YOU HAVE MUNDO 0/5/0 KATA 1/4/1 and i just noticed your teams are magically shit af ESPECIALLY ON PROMOS

I won 6/10 games and also got bronze 5. My friend won 2/10 games and got bronze 1. What the hell is riot thinking. Also, in all the games I played better than he did, So it could have been how he played.{{champion:17}} {{item:3512}}

So I won 9 out of 10 games, never got below an A- and 3 of the games I received an S-, S, and an S+. Still got bronze 5. I agree there is a large issue with the placement system. Anyone know the cause of this?
And my rank last season, started as bronze 5 and earned my way to bronze 1.

thats exactly what happened to me I won 10/10 and got placed in bronze 5 I checked my mmr on op.gg when I was bronze 4 and it said it was better than it normally is in that league and got rated S (or S-, S+) but still got placed in bronze 5 I think thats unfair I worked my ass out to win those games and after all the hard work I get this...
Won 8/10 got bronze 5, i trained for days to play these matches and for nothing, ranking up from bronze is the same odds as sodapoppin streaming a sunday

I was Silver I last season, won 9/10 games (the loss was because we had two afk's) for my placements of season 6, and am now Bronze IV. :^)

Side note: I never got my primary role once for my placements.
I won 10/10 and my rating was b+ + in all the games still made it to bronze 5!! Amazing.... >.<

I'm also in the same boat. Last year i pretty much quit playing this game because i could not get out of bronze. i would carry most of my games. but when it came to getting into the next tier i would always be sabotaged by some really awful players. so awful that me being 13/0 in a match meant nothing. im really dissatisfied with Riot and they're ranking. I have recently completed my provis...like 5 minutes ago. won 8/10. did fairly well in carrying, since i only like to play mid/adc (that way i can carry). my rank is b5. WHUTTTT????? i seriously need a real explanation. just because my ranked elo was blah blah last year doesnt mean it should reflect upon my new ranking. i literally checked lolnexus and saw in a few games that there were players who were diamond,platinum, and gold in  my provis games. still won. 

i dont mean to rage but f*** you riot. i'll give blizzard my time instead. dota2 takes more skill anyways.

*edit* just checked my op.gg   only 1 game i deserved losing. went 1/8 in it. most games my i cs at about 6.4-7.0 cs per min

I was Bronze II last season, but I was also being paired up with Silvers for some reason. This season I was getting paired with High Bronze, Low Silvers (and a Gold IV for some reason on the enemy team), I only lost three when I was playing as a support for a team that threw somehow. But I played the other seven pretty well. I ended up carrying all of them. I ended up getting S's and A's for every game. When I finished my placements I was shocked to see that I was put into Bronze V. A friend of mine won all of her placements and she was Play III last season. Now She's in Silver V. I don't understand. I thought I'd be able to make it into Silver this year so I can stop dealing with all of the bad teams who all just want to focus on kills. But I suppose not. Thanks Riot. 

-Draynorus
just won 9/10 of my placement games and got bronze 5 also  =D
